title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 5: Strength → Power (RFD) & Serve Speed
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Convert strength to racket‑head speed; faster rate changes and lower contact times.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: MB overhead & scoop toss 4x5 each (track distances)
Serve velocity sets: 6x5 serves (track best MPH/kph; cue leg drive)

notes: Week 1: Olympic derivatives light/moderate. Week 2: add contrast sets.
